Directed by: Nicolas Saada
With Guillaume Canet, Stephen Rea, Hippolyte Girardot
Release Date in Cinemas: 28 January 2009
Genre: Spy, Romance
Running Time: 01:39:01
Year of Production: 2009

Synopsis: A brilliant young man, Vincent has nevertheless not followed the path offered by his studies. He works at an airport in the baggage-sorting centre. While his colleague searches a diplomatic satchel, he's killed by the explosion of a flask of perfume. Vincent catches his landlord, a Syrian, as he tries to recover the satchel. The French Secret Service forces him to accept a deal: in exchange for his collaboration with the French and British Secret Services to find the men involved in the explosion, he will not be prosecuted for the thefts committed in the baggage centre.
